'''The Lay of the Children of Húrin''' is a lay written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], and the first chapter of ''[[The Lays of Beleriand]]''.

==Contents==
* Prologue (Húrin and Morgoth)
** Túrin's Fostering
** Beleg
** Failivrin
* Second Version of the Lay
** (Húrin and Morgoth)
** Túrin's Fostering
